column5: Updated, new decor, attention to detail. 4 bedrooms (3 have 2 Queens, Master has 2 Kings). 2 full baths. HDTV's throughout w/full cable package. Huge outdoor space w/fire pit, grill and hot tub, TV. Great for couples or group of adults!
column8: 2 Kings/6 Queens. Hot Tub. Updated Stadium Home!
